title: Most effective in treatment of schizophrenia

content.question: Which of the following has been most effective in the treatment of schizophrenia?

choices.label: Drug therapy that blocks neurotransmitter sites
Drug therapy that increases the activity of limbic system neurons

content.answer: Drug therapy that blocks neurotransmitter sites

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
